Posts.Content: Jun 23, 2017 07:41PM MChid wrote: The same thing happened to me the Dr told me that they could only prolong my life for 10 years...went to a new Dr. told them I wanted to fight and did. 9 months they told me I was cancer free. While I do not know all the details when you want to fight you find someone that is willing fight with yo
